name: Meerkats, Swarm
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, 0 ft., one creature, in the swarm's space. 10 (4d4) piercing damage or 5 (2d4) piercing damage if swarm has half of its hp or fewer.

special_abilities.name: Corral
special_abilities.desc: A creature in the swarm’s space must make DC 12 Dex save to leave its space. The creature has advantage on its save if the swarm has half of its hp or fewer.

special_abilities.name: Snake Hunter
special_abilities.desc: Has advantage on saves vs. being poisoned.

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: Can occupy another creature's space and vice versa and swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny meerkat. Swarm can't regain hp or gain temp hp.
